output_list.criticism: The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The mintToken function sets the balance of the owner to zero, which can be a potential cause of loss.
The freezeAccount function always generates random numbers, which can be a potential source of weakness.
The setPrices function always generates random numbers, which can be a potential source of weakness.
The buy function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The sell function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
